primary.context: Customer wanted to pay their maintenance fee for The Grandview at Las Vegas.
primary.detail: The AI successfully verified the account and sent a payment link via text/email.

secondary.context: Customer wanted to update contact information on the account.
secondary.detail: The AI correctly identified the request as out-of-scope and transferred the caller to the concierge department.

steps: Agent greeted customer and identified intent to pay fees.
Agent performed account lookup using phone number and verified state.
Agent provided balance information and confirmed contact details.
Customer requested to change their phone number.
Agent transferred the call to concierge for the account update.

actions.detail: Verified state of residence as Oregon.
Sent payment link to verified email and phone.
Transferred to concierge for phone number change.

insights.summary: The AI handled the primary payment request efficiently and correctly transferred the secondary out-of-scope request to a human agent.
insights.verbatim: I need to change the phone number.
